law.catch_line: Subject to the hearing provisions of § 5-516 of this subtitle, if a licensee violates any provision...
law.text:
Subject to the hearing provisions of § 5-516 of this subtitle, if a licensee violates any provision of this subtitle or of a rule or regulation adopted under this subtitle, the Administration may:
suspend the license for a period not exceeding 1 year; or
revoke the license.
